Title: Officine Panerai Radiomir Tourbillon GMT Titanio Manually Wound Watch PAM 00315
Description: Watches Jewelry Accessories About us Policies Officine Panerai Radiomir Tourbillon GMT Titanio Manually Wound Watch PAM 00315 (Click to Enlarge) Officine Panerai Radiomir Tourbillon GMT Titanio Manually Wound Watch PAM 00315 Condition: Unworn Brand: Officine Panerai Series: Special Editions 2008 Retail Price: $127,200.00 Reference: PAM 00315 Also Known As: PAM00315 Web ID: 15050Stock Number: 2188867Case Size: 48 mm Gender: Gents Movement: Manual Wind Caliber: P.2005 Bezel: Titanium Functions: Hours, Minutes, Seconds, Tourbillon, GMT, Second Time Zone, Power Reserve Indicator, Day/Night Indicator Strap: Leather Clasp Type: Tang Signatures: Officine Panerai Included Items: Manufacturer's Box and Papers Power Reserve: 144 Hours Materials: Titanium Finishing: Titanium Case Back: Transparent (See-Through) Crown: Screw Down Dial Color: Brown This timepiece from Officine Panerai is a truly unique timepiece that is breaks the mold in comparison to other Officine Panerai watches. The watch is made of hearty titanium and boasts a black dial that displays indication of the hours, minutes, and seconds as well as a 24 hour indicator and second time zone sub-dial. The watch's most impressive complication however, is not obvious to the eye; a tourbillon feature is visible through the watch's transparent case back. Lastly, the watch securely fastens to the wrist with a dark brown leather strap. Water Resistant to 100 meters/330 feetPlease note that some watches are on memo from other dealers and do not carry a return policy, you will be notified before your purchase if the selected watch meets this criteria.
